attributes.review: I went to walk my pet fish and wake him up but then he died so I went and buried him but then I ran out of food so I dug him out and put him on a pan and turned the stove on I realized I didn’t have salt so I went driving to Macy’s but they didn’t have salt! 😡 but I found it on the floor and I went back home and a dinosaur took me home and I went to the stove and my fish was on fire 😱😱😱😱😱😱😱😱😱 so I put him back in his fish tank right next to the fishy 🤢🐱cat, I let him marinate in the water... and then my dinosaur came into make house and gave me a cake because it was my birthday 🥺💞 we ate and my fish was done marinating so I ate fish and cake today. But then Donald Trump 🍊came into my house and shot MY DINOSAUR while we were in bed! 😉😏 HOW DARE HE CHEETO LOOKIN ORANGE 🍊 LOOKING CORN 🌾 LOOKIN SMALL PP🍆 LOOKING RASICT🙅🏿‍♂️ AS* BIH THIS APP IS JUST NO❤️.

attributes.title: BAD APP MY KID CRIED TO DEATH

attributes.review: so i tried to use this app to keep up with our dear president, Donald J. Trump, because i use no other app and have no other access to any other source of information. BUT my phone started to glitch after launching the app? my phone shut down. when i powered it back on, i started getting spam emails and spam calls, claiming they have my information. maybe the app sends my information to china, like facebook and amazon do 👀 either way, i DONT want my identity stolen. do NOT download this app.
attributes.title: made my phone glitch??
